name: AnthraxTestsForBacillusSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Anthrax (Tests for Bacillus species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bacillus species by Culture and Identification Method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Bacillus species by Culture and Identification Method),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
